tutorial.title: How to play?
tutorial.1: If you play together, please sit and look at each other.

2.3: in this room, if you don't have or want to add questions

3.2: please enter your friend's name, by click

4.1: Then you can share this room with your friends

tutorial.5: If you have added questions and shared this room with your friends, feel free to start asking each other :)
